name: part_004
file: tmp_【Birthdayお披露目】かわいいけどかっこいいを目指していくヴァ！！【#ときのそら生誕祭ライブ 】 [AtbVQjUesq4]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_004.mov

subtitles.original: ...放なす 夢見ない心
subtitles.english: ...lets go, a heart that doesn't dream

subtitles.original: 見つめられるほどに 嘘がつけない
subtitles.english: The more you look at me, the more I cannot lie

subtitles.original: 力なく点滅する あの街灯を
subtitles.english: That streetlight flickering powerlessly

subtitles.original: 見上げてたその横顔は 優しかった
subtitles.english: The profile of you looking up was kind

subtitles.original: 破れそうに膨らんで
subtitles.english: Swollen to bursting

subtitles.original: 真っ赤に熟れた果実は
subtitles.english: and ripened deep red, the fruit

subtitles.original: 誰かの摘む手を待っている
subtitles.english: Is waiting for someone's hand to pick it

subtitles.original: ねぇ それは私だった
subtitles.english: Hey, that was me

subtitles.original: あなたが溢れていく
subtitles.english: You overflow,

subtitles.original: 抑えた胸の数だけ
subtitles.english: by the amount of suppressed feelings in my chest

subtitles.original: 隠せない始まりを
subtitles.english: Conveying the unhideable beginning

subtitles.original: 過ぎた月へ
subtitles.english: to the moon that has passed

subtitles.original: 手のひらに伝えてゆくよ
subtitles.english: Into the palm of my hand

subtitles.original: 風は冷たいのに そんな心は赤いままに
subtitles.english: Though the wind is cold, such a heart remains red

subtitles.original: あなたに触れたいと思ってしまった どうして
subtitles.english: I ended up wanting to touch you, why?

subtitles.original: 二人でいたの
subtitles.english: Were we together?

subtitles.original: 痛くて 苦しくて それなら
subtitles.english: It hurts, it's painful, if so

subtitles.original: 見えないようにどこかへ 飛んでゆけ
subtitles.english: Fly away somewhere so I can't see you

subtitles.original: そう思うのに
subtitles.english: Though I think that

subtitles.original: あなたを探してる 何度も
subtitles.english: I'm searching for you, many times

subtitles.original: 名前を呼んで
subtitles.english: Calling your name

subtitles.original: 空には一つだけ
subtitles.english: In the sky, only one

subtitles.original: 淡く光る小さな星を浮かべて
subtitles.english: Small star floating, shining faintly

subtitles.original:
Beyond
作詞・作曲：星野寿菜子
subtitles.english:
Beyond
Lyrics & Music: Sunako Hoshino

subtitles.original: 夕映えに揺らゆたう
subtitles.english: Swaying in the sunset glow,

subtitles.original: 少し伸びた前髪と影法師
subtitles.english: slightly grown bangs and a silhouette

subtitles.original: 巡る日々 楽しかった分だけ
subtitles.english: The revolving days, as much as they were enjoyable

subtitles.original: 今日が終わってしまうことがどうしても
subtitles.english: That today is ending, no matter what

subtitles.original: 寂しくなるけど
subtitles.english: It makes me lonely, but...

subtitles.original: 忘れないで 同じ空を
subtitles.english: Don't forget that the same sky

subtitles.original: 見上げていること
subtitles.english: We are looking up at

subtitles.original: どんな君だって 愛しく思うから
subtitles.english: Because I love you, whoever you are

subtitles.original: 大丈夫 大丈夫だって歌うから
subtitles.english: I'll sing that it's okay, that it's okay

subtitles.original: 変わりゆく中で 変わらない気持ちで
subtitles.english: Amidst the changing, with unchanging feelings

subtitles.original: ずっと 大丈夫だって歌うから
subtitles.english: I'll always sing that it's okay

subtitles.original: 時間も距離も超えて心は
subtitles.english: Crossing time and distance, my heart

subtitles.original: そばにあるから
subtitles.english: Will be by your side

subtitles.original: 五月雨に濡れて
subtitles.english: Wet by the early summer rain,

subtitles.original: 凍えた爪先じゃ歩けずに
subtitles.english: unable to walk with frozen toes

subtitles.original: 惑う日々 悲しかった分だけ
subtitles.english: Wandering days, as much as they were sad

subtitles.original: 明日が少しでも輝くように
subtitles.english: So that tomorrow shines, even just a little
